alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Macon, Pulaski, northwestern Wilcox, northern Dooly and southwestern Houston Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Clearview to Pinehurst to near Pope City, and moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hawkinsville, Oglethorpe, Unadilla, Montezuma, Byromville, Pineview, Pinehurst, Dooling, Browndale, Whitewater State Park, Grovania, Elko, Mock Springs, Pope City, Grove Park, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, Wallace, Clearview and Tippettville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
